statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -5 \\ 1 \\ -6 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 16 \\ 6 \\ 16 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -5 \\ 1 \\ -6 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 16 \\ 6 \\ 16 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
